overview: The project has been transformed from a basic counter application into a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde, featuring a comprehensive onboarding flow with sliding transitions and authentication capabilities.
key_events: Removal of counter functionality and related components
Implementation of authentication and validation services
Addition of sliding transitions between pages
Integration of Gyde branding throughout the application
user_requests: Create onboarding flow for Gyde luxury chauffeur service
Implement seven specific onboarding pages with exact content
Include authentication options for phone and email
system_responses: Planned transformation of counter app into luxury chauffeur service onboarding flow
Designed new architecture with authentication and validation services
Created new feature folders for authentication and onboarding
Implemented new ViewModels for each onboarding page
Added form validation and state management across input pages
current_state: The application now functions as a luxury chauffeur service platform with a sophisticated onboarding flow. It includes welcome, authentication, verification, and terms pages with sliding transitions. The system incorporates phone and email authentication options, form validation, and state management. All previous counter functionality has been removed, and the UI reflects the Gyde brand identity throughout all components.
